scripts.server: cross-env DATABASE_URL=$(heroku config:get DATABASE_URL -a eventscape-dev) NODE_ENV=development pm2 start ecosystem.config.js
scripts.server-local: cross-env DATABASE_URL=postgresql://localhost/eventscapelocal IS_LOCAL=true NODE_ENV=development pm2 start ecosystem.config.js
scripts.node-dev: cross-env DATABASE_URL=$(heroku config:get DATABASE_URL -a eventscape-dev) NODE_ENV=development node server.js
scripts.node-prod: cross-env DATABASE_URL=$(heroku config:get DATABASE_URL -a eventscapeio) NODE_ENV=development node server.js
scripts.node-staging: cross-env DATABASE_URL=$(heroku config:get DATABASE_URL -a eventscape-staging) NODE_ENV=development node server.js
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.deploy-s3: cross-env NODE_ENV=production aws s3 sync build/ s3://eventscape-react-app
